_kata_name_help: Name of the coding kata (e.g., 'FizzBuzz', 'Roman Numerals'). Used for directory naming.
_use_dated_prefix_help: Add YYYYMMDD date prefix to directory name for chronological organization.
directory_name: {% if cookiecutter.use_dated_prefix == 'yes' %}{% now 'local', '%Y%m%d' %}_{{ cookiecutter.kata_name.lower().replace(' ', '_') }}{% else %}{{ cookiecutter.kata_name.lower().replace(' ', '_') }}{% endif %}
_directory_name_help: Custom directory name. When provided explicitly, signals integration mode (skips GitHub repo creation). Leave blank to use auto-generated name from kata_name.
_open_ide_help: IDE to open after scaffold generation. 'none' (default) for safe automation, 'vscode' for VS Code, 'pycharm' for PyCharm.
